---
title: 'uv-run'
description: "Run a built artifact in an isolated uv environment"
---

Run a built expression using the same uv environment as the packaged sdist. Mirrors `xorq run` but ensures runtime dependencies match the build.

## Usage

Pass a build path and optional output path and format.

```bash
xorq uv-run <build_path> [OPTIONS]
```

## Arguments

The build to execute.

| Argument | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `build_path` | Path to the build directory (from `xorq build` or `uv-build`) |

## Options

Where to write output and how to format it.

| Option | Short | Default | Description |
|--------|-------|---------|-------------|
| `--output-path` | `-o` | (discard) | Where to write output; use `-` for stdout |
| `--format` | `-f` | `parquet` | Output format: `csv`, `json`, `parquet`, or `arrow` |
| `--cache-dir` | | (system cache) | Directory for parquet cache files |

## Examples

Common usage patterns.

```bash
xorq uv-run builds/7061dd65ff3c -o results.parquet
xorq uv-run builds/7061dd65ff3c -f json -o -
```
